img_above_text:
# Mind Core
Mind Cores, like Blood of the Iron Bull, are one of the rarest Crafting Materials in Black Myth: Wukong and it is vital that you find as many of them as possible to be able to provide passive upgrades to your stats, health, damage, and defense.

img_summary: The image depicts the inventory screen from the game Black Myth: Wukong, highlighting a rare crafting material called "Mind Core." The Mind Core is described as an epic and rare material, essential for crafting Celestial Medicines and providing passive upgrades to stats, health, damage, and defense. The inventory shows the player currently holds one Mind Core out of a possible 999.
